DeepCool MULTI CORE X8 17-inch Laptop Cooler

The DeepCool MULTI CORE X8 is a high-performance 17-inch laptop cooler designed to keep your laptop running at optimal temperatures during intense usage. Its sleek and durable design features a pure aluminum panel with four anodized black aluminum panels, not only providing efficient thermal dissipation but also offering a cool and stylish appearance. The MULTI CORE X8 is its innovative cooling system. The panel is divided into four parts, each equipped with a built-in 10cm fan. These fans are strategically placed to create a vertical airflow design that guides the airflow along four directions. This unique 4-direction fan airflow ensures that every single heat-generating point of your notebook is covered, including hotspots like the HDD or VGA card area. As a result, the cooler is highly effective in dissipating heat from these critical locations. To cater to different levels of notebook heating, the MULTI CORE X8 is equipped with Creative Multi-Core Control Technology. Users have the option to choose from four different fan operating combinations: all four fans ON, two upper fans ON, two downside fans ON, or all four fans OFF. This flexibility allows you to adapt the cooling performance based on the intensity of your laptop's heat generation. The cooler also comes with small foldable feet that have soft silica gel pads at the bottom of the panel. These feet serve a dual purpose – they prevent the notebook from slipping during use and protect the notebook's edges from scratches. The Vertical Airflow Design of the MULTI CORE X8 ensures rapid heat dissipation by efficiently channeling the cooling airflow, making sure your laptop stays within safe operating temperatures even during demanding tasks. The MULTI CORE X8 provides added convenience with two built-in USB 2.0 ports. These ports allow you to connect external USB devices, making it perfect for charging your mobile phone or transferring data while using the cooler. The DeepCool MULTI CORE X8 features a compact design with fan dimensions of 100X100X15mm. The compact size allows it to fit perfectly under most 17-inch laptops without obstructing the laptop's portability. The cooler utilizes a Hydro Bearing system, which provides smooth and reliable fan operation while reducing noise levels. The fan operates at a rated voltage of 5VDC, ensuring low power consumption while delivering effective cooling performance. With an operating voltage range of 4.5 to 5VDC, the cooler maintains stable and consistent fan speed to efficiently regulate laptop temperatures. The cooler's fans start running at 4VDC, ensuring a quick and smooth startup without any delays. The rated current of the fan ranges from 0.2±10% to 0.4±10%A, which contributes to the efficient cooling of your laptop. The cooler consumes minimal power, requiring only 1 to 2W of input to operate effectively. The DeepCool MULTI CORE X8's fans can reach a maximum speed of 1300±10% RPM, delivering a strong airflow to dissipate heat rapidly. With a maximum air flow of 53.4 CFM (Cubic Feet per Minute), the cooler ensures efficient heat dissipation, effectively lowering the laptop's temperature during heavy usage. Operating at a quiet 23dB(A), the cooler ensures that your gaming, work, or entertainment experience remains undisturbed by loud fan noises.
